config.description: Login then add item to card, verify then remove the item and verify that it was removed then logout

cases.title: Add item, verify, remove, verify, and logout flow
steps: Add 'Sauce Labs Backpack' to the cart using selector: #add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack
Navigate to the shopping cart page to verify item addition using selector: .shopping_cart_link
Remove 'Sauce Labs Backpack' from the cart using selector: #remove-sauce-labs-backpack
Open the side menu to prepare for logout using selector: #react-burger-menu-btn
Logout from the application using selector: #logout_sidebar_link
